body.Body:
The autopilot device with serial @{items('For_each_Autopilot_Device_with_unassigned_Profile')?['SerialNumber']} does not have associated an Autopilot Profile.
You need to navigate to Microsoft Endpoint Manager and set Autopilot Profile for the device.

Please do not forget to use your T2 account for accessing Microsoft Endpoint Manager.
body.Subject: Microsoft Endpoint Manager - Configure Autopilot Profile

body.Body:

body.Subject: Microsoft Endpoint Manager - Configure Autopilot Profile

body.Body:
The device @{items('For_each_MDE_Device')?['computerDnsName']} does not have Device Tag confgured.
You need to navigate to Microsoft Defender for Endpoint and set Device Tag for the device.

Please do not forget to use your T1 account for accessing Microsoft Defender for Endpoint.
body.Subject: Microsoft Defender for Endpoint Manager - Configure MDE Device Tag

body.messageBody:

body.Body:
The device @{items('For_each_Managed_Device_to_Manually_Configure')?['name']} does not have Device Category confgured.
You need to navigate to Microsoft Endpoint Manager and set Device Category for the device.

Please do not forget to use your T2 account for accessing Microsoft Endpoint Manager.
body.Subject: Microsoft Endpoint Manager - Configure Device Category
